items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants and sizes.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: A card container component with header, content, and footer sections.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: A badge component for displaying status labels and tags.

items.name: health-matrix
items.title: Health Matrix
items.description: A health metrics visualization grid displaying KPIs with status indicators, sparklines, and trend analysis. Designed for healthcare and wellness dashboards.

items.name: sankey-chart
items.title: Sankey Chart
items.description: An interactive Sankey flow diagram for visualizing data flows between categories. Supports custom colors, tooltips, and responsive sizing.

items.name: analytics-dashboard
items.title: Analytics Dashboard
items.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with KPI cards, area/bar charts, and configurable time ranges. Built for data-driven applications.
